title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, April 28, 2020
description: It's the birthday of poet Carolyn Forché (1950), whose first collection won the Yale Younger Poets Award and whose latest collection came out just last month.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of poet Carolyn Forché (1950), whose first collection won the Yale Younger Poets Award and whose latest collection came out just last month.
